column4: The ATI Radeon open-source driver HowTo has anyone done this????
I just did it and I get a error
what exact howto did you follow? give a link, please.
show me output of lspci on paste.ubuntu-nl.org
open it in a browser, run lspci in a terminal, post output from the command to the pastebin site, and give us a link.
your card has only experimental 3d support... run "$ glxinfo | grep vendor" in a terminal, and show me output on pastebin, please.
now run glxinfo | grep "direct rendering" and show output again, please.
yes, it is part of it.
did you see my last paste

it seems it is a bug with the fre driver, according to this https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-driver-ati/+bug/58541, can you read a little and see whether it applies to your issue?
me either. wait for someone to be available on #ubuntu-xgl.
ya, ask about your error on that channel, and wait for someone to be able to help, sorry, that is the only thing I can recommend.
thankyou at least you are trying and I am farther than before
